column3:
テル村の外れにある廃屋の地下室
度々周囲で魔物が目撃され、夜は不気味な
物音が響くこともしばしば
今では近寄る者はほとんどいない
column4:
The basement of an abandoned house
on the outskirts of Tel Village.
Frequently, monsters are sighted in the area,
and at night, eerie sounds are often heard.
Nowadays, hardly anyone approaches it.

column3:
ハイデル平原とミスリウ森林を繋ぐ自然洞窟
以前は狩人により頻繁に使われていたが
テルの南に橋が建造されてからは安全面の
問題から立ち入り禁止になっていた
column4:
The natural cave that connects the Hidell Plains
and Mysree Forest was previously
frequently used by hunters.
However, since a bridge was built south of Tel,
it has been prohibited to enter
due to safety concerns.

column3:
テル村の裏手にある枯れ井戸
使われなくなって久しいが、たまに妙な物音
や悪臭が中から漂ってくることがある
column4:
A dried up well behind Tel village.
It has been unusable for a long time,
but occasionally strange sounds and rank odors
may drift out from inside.

column3:
ハイデル街道の傍にある枯れ井戸
リザードマンや、時にはさらに恐ろしい魔物が
潜伏していることもある
まだ見習いの覚者や騎士は、下手に内部を
探査しないほうがよい
column4:
Next to Hidell Road, there is a dried-up well.
Sometimes, Saurians or even more
terrifying enemies lurk around.
Apprentice Arisen and Knights are advised
not to venture into its depths without caution.

column3:
ハイデル平原、グリッテン砦に近い川沿いの
小墓地。古い時代から存在しており、それほど
広くないものの現在は彷徨う死者の目撃例が
絶えず、近寄る者はいない
column4:
A small cemetery along the river
near Fort Gritten in Hidell Plains.
It has existed since ancient times and,
although not very large, there are constant
sightings of wandering souls.
No one dares to approach.

column3:
ハイデル平原、倒壊した家の地下室
周囲に猿獣が群れていることが多いため
内部にも入り込んでいる可能性が高い
column4:
The basement of a collapsed house
in the Hidell Plains. Brute apes are often
seen flocking around the cellar,
so it is highly probable they are also inside.

column3:
天空より飛来した異様な石の塊《大石塊》
圧倒的な存在感は他に比類するものがなく、この
物体が現在レスタニアに存在するあらゆる技術
魔術の域を大きく凌駕していることは間違いない
column4:
A massive boulder-like object that descended
from the sky, with an incomparable,
overwhelming presence.
There is no doubt that this object surpasses
all existing technological advancements
and magickal artes in Lestania.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
テルの西に落下したアークの裏側から続く別階層
表側とは異なり、こちらには恐るべき危険性を
秘めた大型の錬魔も確認されたという。後に神殿を
攻める足がかりとして準備されていた可能性がある
column4:
<COL ffdc78>A door requiring a "Jewelry" key.</COL>
Another layer that continues from the back
of the Ark that fell west of Tel.
This passage is far more dangerous
than the front. A strange odor is present
here as well. It's possible that this location
was prepared as a foothold in case of attack.

レスタニア西部の海岸地帯
白い砂浜が続く景色は美しいが、時には思いも
よらぬものが浜辺に流れ着くことも。温暖で湿った
気候から、乾燥しがちのハイデル平原とは植生や
生息する魔物も異なる
column4:
A coastal zone in western Lestania.
The view of the white sandy beach is beautiful.
With its dry climate, the flora and fauna
found there differs from the Hidell Plains.

column3:
ブリア海岸地域の漁村
比較的おだやかな環境に恵まれ、海が近く人々も
おおらか。しかし、海が村にもたらすものは魚や貝
だけではない。座礁船や、時には海竜といった脅威
が姿を現すこともある
column4:
Breya Coast region's fishing village.
It is blessed with a relatively calm environment
and a close proximity to the sea,
making the people easy-going.
However, what the sea brings in
to the village is not just fish and shellfish.
There are also threats such as stranded ships
and sometimes even sea dragons that appear.

column3:
ブリア海岸の岬に立つ古い灯台
洋撃船や漁船の標として、レスタニアの海を
照らし続けてきた。灯台守は代々、退役騎士が
務める習わしとなっており、現在の守番は高名な
《シールドセージ》、ルドルフォである
column4:
The old lighthouse on the cape of Breya Coast.
Shining over the sea of Lestania as a beacon
for foreign ships and fishing boats.
It is a tradition for retired knights
to serve as lighthouse keepers, and the current
guardian is the renowned Shield Sage, Rudolfo.

column3:
ローテスに近い岸壁裏の小さな浜
人目に付きにくく、村や街道にも近いため、ならず者
が野宿をしたり盗品の一時保管に使う事も多い
覚者がローテスに立ち寄った際は、浜に異変がないか
確認しておいたほうがいい
column4:
A small beach behind the quay near Rotes.
It is hidden from view and close to the village
and the road, so it is often used by rogues
to camp out and temporarily store stolen goods.
When Arisen stop by Rotes, they should check
the beach to see if there is anything unusual.

column3:
ブリア海岸、岬に近い断崖地帯の大岩群
多数のハーピーが棲息しており、彼女らの巣が
密集していることから、村人達からその名で呼ばれて
いる。灯台に用がある時以外、鳥寄せ岩の付近を
通らぬよう村人は子供の頃から教えられている
column4:
An outcropping of rocks in the cliff area
near the cape of the Breya Coast.
Infested by Harpies, it is rife with their nests.
As a result, it has been dubbed "Birdcall Rock".
The villagers have been taught since childhood
not to pass near Birdcall Rock unless
they have business at the lighthouse.

column3:
海辺にある朽ちた廃屋の地下倉庫
魔物やならず者の溜まり場になりやすい
ことから封鎖されたが、何者かが侵入
したらしい形跡や物音が最近しばしば
確認されている
column4:
An abandoned underground storehouse
beneath a decaying shack by the seaside.
Monsters and rogues tend to gather here, 
which is why it was sealed off.
However, there have recently been sightings
of a trespasser and strange noises.

column3:
南の海岸へ続く谷道にある、小鬼のキャンプ地
残虐で体格の大きなホブゴブリンの目撃があり
村人にとって不安の種となっている
また、このキャンプを境に南側は強力な魔物が
多いため、むやみに近づかない方がいい
column4:
There have been sightings of vicious
Hobgoblins in the valley path leading
to the southern coast, where the 
smaller goblins have set up their camp.
This has become a cause of concern
for the villagers. Additionally, there are
powerful enemies to south of this camp,
so it is best to remain cautious.

column3:
数十年以上昔に魔物に襲われ、廃村と化した集落
白竜の力が弱まって後、恐ろしい魔物の襲撃にあい
抵抗の術もないまま一夜にして滅んだらしいが、
現在は当時の本当の経緯を知る者はいない
column4:
Decades ago, this village was attacked
by monsters and abandoned.
After the power of the White Dragon waned,
the village suffered a terrifying monster raid.
It is said that the village was destroyed
overnight without any means of resistance.
But no survivors remain to tell the tale.

column3:
ブリア海岸、南部に広がる浜辺
かつてはここも漁民にとって生活の場であったが
今や完全に魔物が徘徊する危険地帯となっている
特に近頃は大型の魔物が居付いてしまったようだ
column4:
A beach that stretches out
in the southern part of Breya Coast.
Though fishermen once resided here,
it has since become the domain of beasts.
Lately, the monstrosities here have further
grown in size and strength.

column3:
ブリア海岸のはずれ、断崖の中腹に入り口を
もつ自然洞窟。絶えず水音が聞こえることから
潮騒洞窟と呼ばれ、奥の滝は霊験あらたかとの
噂だが、ある事件をきっかけに封鎖されていた
column4:
On the edge of the Breya coast,
midway 'twixt the clifftop and waves
lies the entrance to a natural cave. 
It is known as the Roaring Tide Cave
due to the constant sound of rushing water.
There are rumors that the waterfall deep
within it possesses a mysterious power.
However, following an incident,
it has been sealed off.

column3:
《灯台下の古井戸》を覗き込んだ者が何か煌めく
ものを見たという噂が流れたが、古井戸の中には
投げ捨てられた廃棄物や動物の死骸などもどこかに
溜まっているであろうことから、内部に入ってまで
噂の元を探ろうとする者はいないようだ
column4:
Rumors say that if one peers down
the "Lighthouse Old Well",
a slight glimmer can scarce be made out.
However, the accumulated waste 
and animal effluvia ward away any who would
be willing to investigate.

column3:
モルトバ灯台の傍にある古井戸
水が引いて後はリザードマンなどの魔物が
出入りするようになった
機能しているかは不明だが、魔物の侵入を
防ぐための古い装置が残っている
column4:
An old well next to the Moltova Lighthouse.
Long gone dry, numerous Saurians have made
their nests here. There are still old traps
that might deter Saurians and their ilk,
though it is unclear if they still function.

column3:
青爪浜にある廃村ルフローの地下室
ブリア海岸の奥は強力な魔物が多いため
とっさに逃げ場のない地下室の探索時は
準備をしておく方がいいだろう
column4:
It would be wise to prepare before exploring 
what lays beneath the deserted village
of Ruflow in Blue Claw Beach.
The depths of Breya Coast are home
to many powerful enemies.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
ブリア海岸傍の灯台下の井戸の中に入口が発見された
忘れられた古代の水路遺跡。長く閉鎖され未踏の地
であったため、独自の生態系を保持した環境と
なっているようだ
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
An entrance has been discovered within a well
beneath the lighthouse near the Breya Coast.
It seems an ancient aqueduct,
long ago forgotten. A unique ecosystem
has arisen in mankind's absence.

レスタニア南部の広大な森林
多くの動植物、人、そして魔物が住み、それを可能
にするだけの恵みに満ちている。また、森のいたる
所に自然洞窟や旧時代の遺跡なども存在するため
探索には事欠かない地域である
column4:
A vast forest in southern Lestania.
A rich land with a wide variety of animals,
plants, people, and creatures.
Moreover, the terrain is adorned
with natural caves and ancient ruins
scattered throughout, making it ideal
for exploration.

column3:
ポーンの民が集い、新しき覚者との契約を待つ聖堂
聖堂はレスタニアと異界との接点を守るために
偉大な覚者が大昔建造したと伝えられている
現在は里長アルヴァーが管理者を務めており
《プリースト》の導き手カミュも滞在している
column4:
The holy temple where pawns gather,
awaiting a contract with the newly Arisen.
It is said that the temple was built
by a great Arisen in ancient times to strengthen
the bonds between Lestania and other realms.
Currently, it is managed by the village elder,
Alvar, and the Priest, Camus, who resides there.

column3:
ミスリウ森林中部にある、狩人と木こりの村
獣革や木材、薬草類など森は資源が豊富なため
素材を扱う者にとって重要な村である
ただし森には遺跡や自然洞窟も多く、そこをねぐら
とする魔物への警戒は常に必要だ
column4:
A village of hunters and woodcutters.
Located in the centre of Mysree Forest,
this village is important for those who work
and trade in animal hides, lumber,
and medicinal herbs. However, the forest's ruins 
and natural caves serve as lairs for beasts.
Letting down one's guard is a risky proposition.

column3:
魔女エメラダが住む森林の家
彼女に教えを請うことで
《ソーサラー》として破壊の魔術の
深淵により近づくことができるだろう
column4:
The house in the forest where the Witch
Emerada lives. By seeking her guidance,
one can grow nearer the forbidden heart
of destructive magic treasured by Sorcerers.

column3:
ポーン郷からリンウッド方面に繋がる
木造の橋。南ハイデル大橋と同時期の水害で
破損したが、住民の手が回らず復旧が遅れていた
放置された理由は、ポーン郷へ行く覚者の多くが
リム転移を用いるためらしい
column4:
A wooden bridge that connects
from Pawn Cathedral to Lynwood.
Damaged during the same flood as the South
Hidell Bridge, restoration was delayed
as the residents lacked the resources.
The reason for its abandonment seems to be
because many Arisen who go to Pawn Cathedral
opt to use the Rift Teleport.

column3:
森林北部にあるフォレストゴブリンの集落
カボチャの栽培や狩猟だけではなく、ここには
人や家畜を襲って得た物品も集められている
特に長である《緑鬼グリッガ》とその手下達は
好んで人を襲うため、警戒しなければならない
column4:
A Forest Goblin settlement in the northern part
of the forest. In addition to pumpkin cultivation
and hunting, they also gather items
what they can from travelers and livestock.
In particular, Gurigga the Green Demon
and his minions, who are especially skilled,
relish preying upon those unwary,
so we must be cautious.

column3:
祭祀場にはさまざまな魔物が出没するが、このほど
特に攻撃性の高いエントの出現が確認された
以前も起こったこの特異なエントの出現は
さらに大きな脅威に繋がる可能性がある
早急な討伐と監視が必要だ
column4:
Various monsters have been appearing in the
ritual hall, but recently, the emergence of an
especially aggressive Ent has been confirmed.
The recurring appearance of this peculiar Ent
could potentially lead to an even greater threat.
Swift subjugation and surveillance are necessary.

column3:
リンウッドほど近くにある地下水路
魔物が巣くい使われなくなって久しいが、以前は
この水路で河川の水位を調整し水害に備えていた
リンウッドが水路を閉鎖した後も魔物は増え、
時に凶暴な大猿が出没することもある
column4:
An underground waterway near Lynwood.
Although long abandoned, in the past,
this waterway was used to adjust the water level
of the river to prepare for floods.
After Lynwood closed the waterway, the number
of monsters increased, and at times,
ferocious apes begin to haunt the area.

column3:
注意すべきドレッドエイプ、《唸り猿》が
縄張りにしている廃屋
廃屋の周囲は食い散らかされた動物の残骸が
散乱しており、恐ろしい上非常に臭い――
column4:
The Dread Ape, known as the "Howler Ape," has
taken over this abandoned house as its territory.
The surroundings of the abandoned house
are littered with cast-off remains
of devoured animals, making it both terrifying
and extremely foul-smelling.

column3:
特に危険なドレッドエイプ、《裂き猿》が
巣くっている廃屋
廃屋の周囲は正体不明の死肉が散乱しており
不気味な様子を醸し出している
column4:
In the rundown building where the ferocious
Dread Ape, "Ripper Ape," resides, there are
unidentified carcasses and offal scattered about,
an eerie atmosphere to be sure.

column3:
とりわけ獰猛なドレッドエイプ、《豚喰い猿》が
ねぐらにしている廃屋
廃屋の周囲は攫われた家畜や野豚が
多数溜めこまれている
column4:
The abandoned house that the particularly
ferocious Dread Ape, the "Pig-Eating Ape,"
has made its lair. Around the abandoned house 
lay the remains of numerous abducted livestock
and wild boars in varying states of decay.

column3:
ミスリウ森林の外れに位置する広大な鍾乳洞
そのあまりの深さと、そこをねぐらにする
凶悪な魔獅子の存在から立ち入り禁止になった
奥にはさまざまな魔物や資源があるだろう
column4:
Located on the outskirts of Mysree Forest
is a vast limestone cave.
Access to the cave has been prohibited
as it is incredibly deep and a demonic lion
that has made it their den.
There are likely many foes and useful treasures
laid deep within the winding caves.

column3:
リンウッドからミスリウ森林深部へと向かう一本道の
中ほどにある、少し開けた場所。背の高い木々が多く
鬱蒼としている上に靄が出やすく、開けた印象の割に
視界が悪い。そのためか盗賊や魔物が潜みやすく
森を抜ける際の一番の難所と言われる
column4:
In the middle of the road leading from
Lynwood to Mysree Grove in the Mysree Forest,
a clearing can be found. Here, there are many
tall trees shrouded in a dense fog.
Visibility is poor, making it easy for bandits
and enemies to prowl about, hidden in wait.
It is said to be the most challenging place
to pass through the forest.

column3:
ポーンの民が渡る、この世ならざる空間
世界の淵辺にあたるとされ、普通の人間には足を
踏み入れるどころか、入口を見ることすらできない
"異界歩き"と呼ばれるポーンがなぜ覚者に応え
現れるのか、それを知るのは竜のみである
column4:
The space where pawns wander,
a realm unlike this world.
Believed to exist on the edge of the world,
ordinary humans cannot see the entrance,
let alone step inside. Only the dragons know
why the pawns, called "striders of other worlds"
answer to the Arisen.

column3:
ミスリウ森林南西の大洞窟
深部にある巨大空洞には、名の由来でもある
《燐光虫》という虫が棲息し、星空に迷い込んだかの
ような美しさであると言われる。しかし、鬼人や
エイプの住処ともなっており危険は大きい
column4:
Mysree Forest, located in the southwest,
holds a truly massive cave.
Deep within lies a breathtaking vista
named after the "Glowworms" that reside there;
looking upon its heights is reminiscent
of getting lost in the starry sky. However,
it is also known to be a dangerous dwelling
for Demons and Apes.

column3:
森の南部に位置する小洞窟
内部にはそこそこ開けた空間があり
魔獣の類が巣にしているらしい
時おり、外にまで唸り声が聞こえるという
column4:
In the southern part of the forest,
there is a small cave. Inside, there is
a fair-sized passage in which magical beasts
have made their nests. Occasionally,
their growls echo forth from the depths.

column3:
普通の人間には入口を見ることすらできない
世界の淵辺にあたるとされる空間の深層部
この空間がどのようにして成り立ち、どこに
続いていくのか未だ知る者はいない
column4:
Invisible to ordinary folk,
it connects to a space considered to be
the edge of the world.
No one yet knows how this space is formed
or where it leads.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
ミスリウ森林から深部へ続く洞穴に埋もれていた古い
地下墓地。夜間、どこからともなく森に現れる不死者
達はこの墳墓から彷徨い出たものらしい。長く封じら
れていたため、あまり見ない魔物が潜む可能性が高い
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
A hidden underground cemetery buried deep
within the caves leading from the Mysree Forest.
The undead that appear in the forest at night
seem to have emerged from this tomb.
In these rooms having been sealed long ago,
many adversaries likely await you.

ポーン郷
リンウッド
森の一軒家
西ミスリウ橋

肉裂き館

column3: 支援品ランクアップ

最大標高を誇るボルド山を主とした山岳地帯
鉱石の名産地であり、古くから採掘師と武具職人
にとっては中心地だった。さらに、現在活動
は見られないもののボルド山は火山であり、温泉や
毒を含んだ液体なども多く噴出する
column4:
A mountainous region centered around
Mount Volden, which boasts the highest peak.
A rich mining site and a central location
for miners and blacksmiths since ancient times.
Although currently inactive, Mount Volden
often erupts a variety of substances,
from heated, mineral-rich groundwater,
to toxic sulfrous ooze.

column3:
ボルド鉱山ふもとに広がる温泉町
湯あみ場《キノザ鉱泉》を中心に、古くから採掘者や
武具職人になじみの強い地として有名だった
近年鉱山に強力な魔物が出現したことで、
坑道の開発に支障をきたすようになった
column4:
A hot spring town at the foot of Volden Mines.
It is famous for its strong connection to miners
and weapon craftsmen from ancient times.
In recent years, powerful enemies have
appeared in the mines, disrupting their trade.
The heart of this town is Kinoza Mineral Springs,
where people come to soak and relax.

column3:
鉱山の町キノザを象徴する大温泉
労働者から富裕層まで男女問わず広く愛される
レスタニア随一の保養地である。３種ある浴室は
それぞれ内装や泉質が異なり、誰もが一度は
最高級の湯を夢見る
column4:
The great hot spring that embodies
the mining town of Kinoza is considered
the finest resort in Lestania.
It is loved by all, from laborers to the wealthy.
There are three types of baths, which differ
in adornment and the quality of the water.
Everyone dreams of experiencing
the highest quality hot spring at least once.

column3:
自然洞窟を利用したゴブリン族のねぐら
《貪欲のギルスタン》を王とし、多くのゴブリンが
洞穴に出入りしている。王の蒐集癖のせいか
生き残りのためか、洞穴に住まうゴブリン達は
人間との対立を避けているようだ
column4:
Goblin tribe's lair, utilizing a natural cave.
Gilstan, the King of Greed, leads them.
Many goblins come and go from the cave.
Perhaps due to the king's hoarding habit
or for the sake of survival, the goblins dwelling
within seem to avoid confrontation with humans.

column3:
ボルド鉱山とダウ渓谷の境には、南壁谷と
呼ばれる谷道があるが、その中ほどにあるのが
《南壁のひび》と呼ばれる洞窟である。採掘に
出向いた者がことごとく戻らなかったことから
キノザにより入り口は閉ざされた
column4:
Southern Wall Gorge, on the border
between Volden Mines and Dowe Valley.
In the middle of that gorge is a cave
known as the Southern Wall Fissure.
Those who brave its depths to mine its quarry
have never returned, leading to its closure.

column3:
レスタニア最大鉱山、中腹の坑道
最盛期には百人とも言われる鉱員が採掘に勤しん
でいたが、崩落と巨人の出現により閉山されて
いた。それでも良質鉱石の産地であることに
変わりなく、再開発を望む声は多い
column4:
Lestania's largest mine, the tunnel
on the mountainside. During its heyday,
it was said that about a hundred miners
worked diligently in the excavation.
However, due to cave-ins and the appearance 
of encroaching Giants, it was closed down.
Nevertheless, it remains a steady source
of high-quality ore, and there are many
who hope for its redevelopment.

column3:
ボルド小坑道へ続く山道。坑道に住む強力な
オーガ《坑道荒らし》の返り討ちに合い、派遣された
騎士団の骸が残されていることから、そう呼ばれて
いる。小坑道は採掘がまだ可能だが、現在は
近づく鉱員はほとんどいない
column4:
The mountain path continues towards
the Volden Narrow Tunnels.
It is called so because the remains of a knight
from the old order were left behind after being
defeated by the powerful Ogre, "Tunnel Thief,"
who so aptly resides there. Although mining
is still possible in the narrow tunnels,
few miners are so foolhardy.

column3:
ボルドの野盗、ムジナ団がアジトにする廃坑道
長らく封鎖されていたものの、鍵が破壊された
らしく再び盗賊の活動が活発化してきた
身ぐるみ剥がされる覚悟がなければ
近づかない方がよいだろう
column4:
Volden's bandits, the Badger Gang,
has made an abandoned mine their hideout.
Sealed long ago, the lock was recently broken.
It seems that the activities of the thieves have
once again intensified. Pray, give a wide berth,
lest ye lose all ye own.

column3:
山頂の小堂が無人化して後、グリフィンが居付き
巣を作ってしまった。そこには、レスタニア各地から
巨鷲の「目に適ったモノ」が集められており、その
多くは人力では撤去できないが、主の不在を狙えば
思わぬ宝物が手に入る――かもしれない
column4:
After the summit chapel became unmanned,
a Griffin settled in and made its nest there.
The nest is littered with a wealth of baubles
whose glint caught the Griffin's eye.
Many of these items are too large to be quickly
carried off, but in the owner's absence,
one could possibly obtain a smaller trinket.

column3:
《ボルド大坑道》の最奥、地層の硬さにより掘削が
見送られた洞穴部。数々の問題を解決して再開発を
行おうとした矢先、不気味な噂が流れて鉱員が
逃げ出し、再び開発の手が中断されることとなった
column4:
In the depths of the Volden Large Tunnels,
mining was halted upon reaching bedrock.
While in the process of finding new veins,
eerie rumors were spread and the miners fled,
terminating all mining operations.

column3:
キノザ近くに存在する元治水路
今は治水路としての機能はなく、鉱毒が溜まる
危険な場所になっている
向かうなら、毒への備えが必要だろう
column4:
Former flood control channel
near Kinoza has many obstacles.
Formerly a drainage channel, 
it is now filled with toxic minerals.
If you plan to go there,
be amply prepared for poison.

column3:
ボルド大坑道と同時期に開発された坑道
ここも以前は鉱員の出入りが多かったが
人喰い鬼が出現するようになり寂れてしまった
たびたび騎士団が派遣されているが
いまだ退治完了の報告はない
column4:
This tunnel was developed around
the same time as the Volden Large Tunnels.
The appearance of man-eating demons
have put a halt to mining operations.
The knight order has been dispatched to investi-
gate, but progress is slow and the work bitter.

column3:
周辺を荒らす悪鬼たちが群れる岩窟
ホボリックの小鬼達と対立するゴブリン集団
のほか、凶悪な人喰い鬼もこの洞窟をねぐら
にしている
column4:
The evil demons that freely rampage
in the surrounding areas flock to the cavern.
In addition, there is a group of goblins
in conflict with the Hobgoblins
that also make this cave their lair.

Beware!

column3:
ボルド大坑道で採掘が盛んだった頃
鉱員がダウ渓谷との連絡用に使っていた坑道
使われなくなって久しいものの、南壁谷の
道がなんらかの事情で塞がった場合は
唯一の交通路となる
column4:
During the time when mining was thriving
in the Volden Large Tunnels,
miners used this tunnel as a means
of communication with Dowe Valley.
Although it has been unused for a long time,
it serves as the only passage if the 
Southern Wall Gorge road becomes blocked
due to any circumstances.

column3:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
ボルド鉱山の頂き近くにあり、キノザからもその
姿を見ることができる。まだ参拝者もいるが
巨鳥が近くに巣くってしまい、悩みの種と
なっている
column4:
In the past, White Dragon altars
were erected throughout the land.
One of them is located near the peak
of Volden Mines, and can be seen
from as far as Kinoza. There are still visitors,
but a giant bird has nested nearby recently,
causing much troubles and vexation.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
《ボルド大坑道》の内部で発見された旧坑道
地熱の影響で坑内の気温が非常に高くなることが
あり、鉱員により早期に封鎖されていた
内部で希少な鉱石が採れるのではと推測されている
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
Inside the Volden Large Tunnels,
an old tunnel was discovered.
Geothermally active, the temperature inside
the tunnel is extremely high, and as a result
it was sealed off by miners early on.
Many speculate that rare minerals abound inside.

平原と山岳地帯の中ほどに位置する大渓谷
渓流と針葉樹林の茂る美しい景観が最大の魅力
自然だけではなく、旧白騎団の古城、見張り塔
など遺構も数多く存在し、かつてここが繁栄の地で
あった事を偲ばせる
column4:
A large valley located in the middle
of a plain and mountainous region.
The most significant charm of this place lies
in its beautiful landscape with flowing streams
and lush coniferous forests.
It's not only the natural beauty but also
the numerous remnants of the old
White Knights' castle, watchtowers,
and other structures that evoke memories
of the past prosperity of this area.

column3:
険しい渓谷にしがみつくように残された小村
かつて、ドリード城主が健在だった時代は賑わって
いたが、北部オーク軍の動きが活発化した頃から
強力な魔物の襲撃もあり、徐々に人が離れた
しかし、景観や古城に魅せられる探訪者は多い
column4:
Nestled in a treacherous ravine,
a small village ekes by. Once thriving
in the days when Lord Dreed ruled, it gradually
lost its inhabitants as the movements
of the Northern Orc army intensified.
Nevertheless, many visitors are still enchanted
by the scenery around the ancient Dreed Castle.

column3:
ひょうきんな軽業師、チェスターが住む家
登ることと身ごなしにかけては卓越した
技能を誇る彼に師事すれば、《シーカー》
としてより高みを目指すことができるだろう
column4:
The house where the playful acrobat Chester, 
who excels in climbing and agility, lives.
If you study under him, you will be able to aim
for greater heights as a Seeker.

column3:
旧時代、ドリード城と周辺の警戒のため建てられた
監視塔。ダウが関所で封鎖される前は、騎士団詰め所
として前時代と同じく利用されていたが、侵入した
オーク軍との一戦により壊滅、再び廃墟と化した
現在は、死肉に集ったハーピーが占拠している
column4:
In the olden days, a surveillance tower was built
to guard Dreed Castle and its surroundings.
Before Dowe was sealed off at the checkpoint,
it was used as a knights' headquarters, just like
in the previous era. However, it was destroyed
and turned into ruins again due to a battle
with the invading Orc army. Currently,
it is occupied by Harpies gathering dead flesh.

column3:
ダウ渓谷の滝近くにある浅瀬。ここはもともと
サルファーリザードの棲息地帯だが、とりわけ
大きく強力な個体が確認された。この個体
《タイガーテール・サルファー》については
特に注意する必要がある
column4:
There is a shallow area near the waterfall
in Dowe Valley. This place was originally
a habitat for Sulfur Saurians, but particularly
large and powerful individuals have been
confirmed. Special attention is needed for one
individual specifically, the "Sulfur Tiger-Tail."

column3:
崖上にある自然洞窟
各種鉱石の採掘場として人の手が入った
時期もあるものの、過去に恐ろしい魔物
の住処となったことで封鎖されていた
column4:
On the cliff, there is a natural cave that has
been used by human hands as a mining site for
various ores.
It has been sealed off due to becoming a dwelling
place for terrifying creatures in the past.

column3:
ドリード城近くの地下墓地
城が白衛騎士団の本拠地であった頃、処罰された
罪人や獄死した者を葬っていた場所であり
今なお重く冷たい空気が漂っている
column4:
Near Dreed Castle is an underground cemetery.
It was a place where convicted criminals
and those who died in prison were buried
when the castle served as the headquarters
of the White Knight Order. Even now,
a heavy and chilling atmosphere lingers.

column3:
ダウ渓谷東部、最も標高の高い崖上に、石象の並ぶ
奇妙な空間がある。そこに、昔ジンゲンに甚大な
被害を出したスフィンクスが再び姿を現した
《妖歌のローレライ》と呼ばれるこのスフィンクスを
確認した際は、急ぎ手を打つ必要がある
column4:
In the eastern part of the Dowe Valley,
on the highest cliff, there is a strange space
lined with stone statues. There, the sphinx
that once caused enormous damage to Jingen
has reappeared. This sphinx, known as the
"Demon Songtress Lorelei" must be dealt with
urgently if it is confirmed!

column3:
ダウ渓谷、カタコンベ付近の木立
逃げ惑う姿勢のまま石と化した人影が木陰に
多数紛れているのが発見され、ジンゲンの
村人を恐怖に陥れた
column4:
Numerous figures, frozen-like statues
in a posture of fleeing, were discovered
hidden among the trees near the Catacombs
in Dowe Valley. This discovery plunged
the villagers of Jingen into deep fear.

column3:
廃墟の地下食糧庫。腐った食べ物を求めて
不死者がぞろぞろ入り込んだという噂があり
ジンゲンの民は気味悪がっている
column4:
A ruined underground supply store.
Rumors have circulated that undead creatures
have swarmed in, seeking rotten food.
The people of Jingen are feeling uneasy about it.

column3:
渓谷の一軒家の裏手にある井戸
まだ掘削中らしく、水源には届いて
いないようだ
column4:
There is a well in the backyard of the Lone House
in the Valley.
It seems that they are still in the process of
digging, and it appears that they have not yet
reached the water source.

column3:
ドリード城にほど近い廃墟の地下ワイン庫
かつては城に献上するワインが集められて
いたそうだが、現在は見る影もない
column4:
The underground wine cellar,
located near Dreed Castle,
is now nothing more than a ruin.
It used to store wines that were once offered
to the castle, but now there is no sign
of its former glory.

column3:
廃墟傍にある古井戸
なぜ「閉ざされた」と呼ばれているかに
ついては詳しく知られていない
column4:
The old well near the ruins is called "closed,"
but the detailed reasons are not well known.

column3:
ドリード監視塔の地下、かつて白衛騎士団
の詰め所だった跡地
ハイデルに神殿が築かれてからもダウを守る
要所だったが、二十年以上前オークに攻められ
無人になった。今も騎士の骸が彷徨っている
column4:
Underground of the Dreed Watchtower,
the site of the former Headquarters
of the White Knight Order. It was a key point
in Dowe's fortifications even after the temple
was built in Hidell, but it was attacked
by Orcs over 20 years ago and left uninhabited.
The remains of the knights still wander around.

column3:
ダウ渓谷、一軒家に近い崖際にある坑道
中には鉱員のなれの果てや野盗、小鬼
などが住みついている
ところどころ、爆薬があれば破壊できる
岩壁が存在する
column4:
In the Dowe Valley, there is a tunnel
located near the cliff, close to a house.
Inside, miners, bandits, and small demons,
among others, have taken up residence.
There are occasional rock walls that can be
destroyed with explosives.

column3:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
渓谷深くにひっそりとたたずんでいるが
風景と相まって廃墟化した今も美しさが残る
column4:
In the olden days, this was one of the altars
of the White Dragon, which was celebrated
in various places. It stands quietly,
deep in the valley, but even now,
amidst its ruins, it retains its beauty,
blending in with the landscape.

column3:
ダウ渓谷にそびえ立つ古城廃墟
３００年前は騎士団長が城主を務めレスタニアの
守りを担っていたが、白竜が墜ちた後に捨てられ
今に至る。内部には住みついた魔物だけでなく
旧時代の遺物も多く残されているらしい
column4:
Standing tall in the Dowe Valley
is the ancient castle ruin. 300 years ago,
it was the stronghold of the knight commander
who protected Lestania. However, it was
abandoned after the fall of the White Dragon,
and it remains deserted to this day.
Inside, not only are there lurking demons,
but also numerous relics from the past era
are said to be preserved.

column3:
ダウ平原中央に存在する水路跡
内部には川の水が流れ込んでおり、同時に周囲
に生息するサルファーリザードも多数
入りこんでいる
column4:
Located in the central part of the Dowe Plains,
there is a trace of a water channel.
Inside, the water from the river flows in,
and at the same time, there are also many
Sulfur Saurians living in the surrounding area.

column3:
かつて、ドリード城主がドリード監視塔と城を
繋ぐために作ったと言われる地下道
そのため入口の一つは塔の近くに、もう一つは
城のどこかと繋がっているらしい
罪人の墓地としても利用されたようだ
column4:
It is said that the underground passage
was once created by the Lord of Dreed Castle
to connect the Dreed Watchtower and the castle.
As a result, one entrance is said to be near
the tower, and the other one is apparently
connected somewhere within the castle.
It appears that it was also used
as a graveyard for criminals.

column3:
かつてドリード城からハイデルへの物資搬入
などに使われていた地下通路
ドリード城が捨てられると同時に封鎖され
現在は朽ちた物資もそのままになっている
column4:
Once used for the transportation of goods
from Dreed Castle to Hidell,
an underground passage now lies sealed
since the abandonment of the castle,
leaving the decaying supplies untouched.

column3:
ドリード城内、《地下通用口》から繋がる水路
もとはドリード城と河川の運搬路を繋ぐ連絡路
であったようだが、城の牢で獄死した者の骨や
入りこんだ魔物、瘴気が溜まり本来の機能は
失われて久しい
column4:
An underground waterway connected
to the "Underground Side Entrance"
within Dreed Castle. Originally, it served
as a passage linking the castle and the river
for transportation purposes. However,
it has long lost its original function due to
the accumulation of bones of those
who perished in the castle's prison,
as well as the presence of invading monsters.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
ダウ渓谷の北にある関所のすぐ裏手にある井戸
何年も前に井戸としての機能を失い、不便な場所に
あったこともあって、修理もされずに放置されていた
いつしかその存在すら忘れられていた
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】 Door</COL>
There is a well located just behind
the Checkpoint to the north of Dowe Valley.
It lost its function as a well many years ago
and was left unattended due to its
inconvenient location. Its existence
had been forgotten over time.

column3: 支援品ランクアップ

ミスリウ森林奥地の湿地林
イニアス湖を中心としたこの森は、リンウッド周辺
とはまた別の表情を見せる。湖の周囲には神秘的
な遺跡が点在し、ここが人とは異なる者の生活圏で
あったことを今に伝えている
column4:
The Mysree Forest,
located deep in the wetland forest,
presents a different facade
from the surroundings of Lynwood.
Mysterious ruins are scattered around the lake,
telling us that this place was once a habitat
for beings different from humans.

column3:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
ミスリウ森林深部を見守る管理者がおり
森深くを訪れる者にとっては大切な
憩いの場所である
column4:
In the old days, there was a shrine
of the White Dragon that was celebrated
in various places.
In the deep part of Mysree Forest,
there is a guardian who watches over it,
and it is an important place for visitors
who delve into the depths of the forest
to find solace and relaxation.

column3:
凄腕のマタギ、イヴァンが住む山小屋
彼の腕は《ハンター》としてレスタニア随一
であると、知る人ぞ知る有名人
だが気難しい性格のためか、戦技を教えて
もらえる者はまれらしい
column4:
Ivan, a skilled Hunter,
resides in a mountain cabin.
His prowess as a Hunter is renowned
throughout all of Lestania.
However, due to his difficult personality,
it is rare for anyone to receive instruction
about his combat techniques.

column3:
森林奥地へ続く山道の崩落が除かれた
これで、さらに深い樹林に踏み入ることも可能に
なった。奥地は秘境のため、十分準備をして
向かうべきだろう
column4:
The collapsed mountain path that leads to
the depths of the forest has been cleared away.
With this, it is now possible to venture further
into the dense woods.
As its interior is an uncharted territory,
it would be advisable to make
thorough preparations before heading there.

column3:
森林深部、イニアス湖の北岸に密猟者がキャンプを
構えている。たちの悪いことに、密猟者が獲物とする
のは獣だけではなく、狩人や旅人も含むという
不意の狙撃に合わぬよう、十分な警戒が必要だ
column4:
In the deep part of the forest,
poachers have set up a camp
on the north shore of Lake Inias.
Unfortunately, the poachers target
not only animals as their prey,
but also hunters and travelers.
To avoid unexpected sniper attacks,
it is necessary to be vigilant and cautious.

column3:
イニアス湖西側、浅瀬と草地の混じったこの場所は
ブルーニュートが多く出没する。その中で、近年
強力な電撃を纏った変異種が現れるようになった
これら《コバルトニュート》と遭遇した場合
討伐が推奨されている
column4:
On the western side of Lake Inias,
in this area mixed with shallow waters
and meadows, there are many Blue Newts.
Among them, in recent years,
a mutated species enveloped in powerful
electric shocks has started to appear.
In case of an encounter with these
"Cobalt Newts," subdue them at once.

column3:
住居跡らしき神秘的な遺跡
廃墟と化してなお、緑生い茂るたたずまいは
壮麗さを残している。内部には不思議な装置が
あり、奥に進むには仕組みの理解を要する
column4:
Mysterious ruins that seem
to have served as a place of residence.
Even in its state of being in ruins,
it retains its splendid beauty,
with lush greenery surrounding it.
Inside, there are peculiar devices,
and understanding their mechanism
is necessary to proceed further.

column3:
霊泉のテラス深部に純白の獅子が現れた
その姿は大理石のように淡く輝き、瞳と口は血と
魔力で赤く濡れているという。フォレストゴブリン
が聖獣として崇めるこの白獅子が村に出てゆく前に
何とか対処しなければならない
column4:
A pure white lion appeared in the depths
of the Sacred Spring Terrace.
Its figure was pale and radiant like marble,
and its eyes and mouth were said to be wet
with blood and magick, creating a red hue.
This white lion, revered by the Forest Goblins
as a sacred beast, must be dealt with
before it leaves for the village.

column3:
いつ存在し、いつ滅びたかも不明な廃村。村の
跡地は緑に覆われ、今や完全に人の気配はない
だが、付近で人のすすり泣きのような声を聞いた、
怪しい人影を見た、といった噂が狩人の間で
囁かれているらしい
column4:
A deserted village whose purpose of existence
and demise are equally uncertain.
The site of the village is now covered
in greenery, and there is no trace
of human presence whatsoever.
However, there are rumors circulating
among Hunters that they have heard voices
resembling a person crying and have seen
suspicious figures nearby.

column3:
森の南、ディナン山道への途中にトロールの寝所
がある。かつて覚者に撃退されしばらく姿を見せな
かった巨人ヨトンがどうやら戻ってきたらしい
人を憎み襲うこの巨人は非常に危険なため
近くを通る時は最大限の警戒が必要だ
column4:
On the way to the Deenan Mountain Road
in the southern forest, there is a troll's territory.
The giant Jotun, who was once repelled
by an Arisen and had not been seen for a while,
seems to have returned.
This giant, who hates humans and attacks them
on sight, is extremely dangerous, so exercise
maximum caution when passing by.

column3:
イニアス湖南側、《霧幻のテラス》付近にて
霞んだような人影に声をかけられたという噂が
続出するようになった。声に応じようとしても
返答が返ってくることはなく、その不気味さ故に
近くを通る者はさらに減少したという
column4:
At Lake Inias on the southern side,
near the Misty Illusion Terrace,
rumors have been spreading that people have
been approached by a figure shrouded in mist.
Despite trying to respond to the voice,
there is no reply, which has only increased
the area's eerieiness and caused
even fewer people to pass by.

column3:
緑に侵食された廃墟の地下倉庫
密猟者が、食糧の貯蔵や寝食に潜むことが
ある。近くには彼らのキャンプもあるため
可能であれば近づかないほうがよい
column4:
Underground storehouse in the ruins,
overrun by greenery. Poachers may hide here
for food storage and rest.
Their camp is also nearby,
so it's best to avoid approaching if possible.

column3:
ミスリウ森林深部、西側にある古い遺跡
内部もまた緑で覆われ、野獣や森小人が
現在の主となっている
column4:
In the deep part of Mysree Forest,
there is an ancient ruin on the west side.
Its interior is also covered in greenery,
and animals and forest spirits
have become its current inhabitants.

column3:
ミスリウ森林深部、南端にある遺跡
特に様々な森の獣が集まる場所であるが、
その理由は遺跡内に存在する霊泉の活力
によるものであるそうだ。また、その奥は
恐るべき白獅子の住処であったという
column4:
In the deep depths of Mysree Forest,
located at the southern end is an ancient ruin.
It is particularly known as a gathering place
for various forest creatures.
The reason for this is said to be the vitality
of the sacred spring that exists within the ruins.
Furthermore, it is said that deep inside,
there was the dwelling of a fearsome white lion.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
ミスリウ深部、イニアス湖の南で新たに発見
された森民の遺跡。湖からくる湿気のせいか
白く靄がかかっている。靄は遺跡の外にまで
漏れ出し、全ての輪郭を朧にしている
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】Door</COL>
A newly discovered forest tribal ruin in the
depths of Mysree, located south of Lake Inias.
Perhaps due to the moisture from the lake,
a white mist hangs in the air,
obscuring the outlines of everything,
even leaking beyond the boundaries of the ruin.

レスタニア最奥、樹海に閉ざされた秘境
樹齢数百年にのぼる巨木が生い茂るこの森は
以前エルフ族が住み、その都を築いた場所である
森の名もまた、エルフ族の言語が元であると
言われている
column4:
In the deepest part Lestania, there lies
a hidden paradise secluded in the forest.
This forest, over hundreds of years old,
is densely populated by towering ancient trees.
It used to be the home of the Elves,
where they built their capital city.
The name of the forest is also said
to originate from the language of the elves.

column3:
ディナンの森唯一の住民が暮らす遺跡
エルフの文化や戦闘術を学びたい者に
とっては特に重要な拠点となるだろう
column4:
The only inhabited site in the Deenan Forest.
An especially important base for those
who want to learn about Elven culture
and their art of warfare.

column3:
エルフの言葉で"森の淀み"を意味するこの場所
には、汚れた土や不純な精気が溜まりやすい
という。それらは時に形を持ち魔物化する
ため、見かけた場合は討伐し浄化したほうがよい
column4:
In the Elven language, this place means
"the stillness of the forest." It is prone
to accumulate unclean soil and impure energy.
Occasionally, these can take shape
and turn into enemies, so it is advisable
to defeat and cleanse them when encountered.

column3:
エルフ族の大規模な住居跡
いくつもの広場や部屋で構成されており、相当数の
エルフがここで暮らしていたことを物語っている
遺跡内部には、特別な水を湛えた井戸が
あるという
column4:
The remains of a large dwelling of the Elves.
Consisting of multiple plazas and rooms,
telling the story of a significant number
of Elves who once lived here.
Inside the ruins, there is said to be a well
with special water springing forth.

column3:
ディナン南部を意味する河岸一帯
銀色の毛を持つ凶暴な猿鬼が徘徊するように
なったようだ
その銀の猿鬼は、エルフ族が森でもっとも
出会いたくない魔物筆頭であったらしい
column4:
The riverbank area that signifies
the southern part of Deenan.
Seems to have become a place
where a ferocious monkey demon
with silver fur wanders.
It seems that this silvered demon
is the foremost creature that the Elves
did not want to encounter in the forest.

column3:
ディナン低地には美しい霊水を湛えた泉がある
その生命力に魅かれ、度々肉体を持たぬ者が
彷徨い出ては命ある者に襲い掛るという
不自然に白い人影を見かけた場合、泉には
近寄らぬほうがいいだろう
column4:
There is a spring in the lowlands of Deenan
that holds beautiful sacred water.
Drawn to its vitality, beings without
physical forms often wander and attack
those of the living.
If you happen to see a strangely white figure,
it's best to stay away from the spring.

column3:
エルフの都《エルテ・ディナン》一角にあるという
住居群の一つ。広大な区画らしいが、長らく閉ざ
されており、内部がどうなっているかは不明
出入り口が閉ざされたのには、なにか理由が
あるのかもしれない
column4:
One of a group of dwellings located
within a corner of the Erte Deenan,
the Elven capital. It appears to be a vast area,
but it has been closed off for a long time,
and what awaits in its interior remains unknown.
There may be a reason for the entrance
to be sealed.

column3:
森の中でも有数の大樹がそびえ立つ広場
まるで大樹に守られているかのような静かな
空間だったが、突如この場で暴れはじめた
エントが確認され、状況は急変しつつある
column4:
In a clearing where one of the largest trees
in the forest stands tall, it was a peaceful space
as if protected by the great tree.
However, suddenly, an Ent, a rare sight
in this area, started rampaging,
and the situation is rapidly changing.

column3:
かつて森の民が使っていたディナン深層林と
ミスリウ森林を繋ぐ自然洞窟
長らく閉ざされていたため、内部が
どうなっているか知る者はいない
column4:
A natural cave that connects the deep forests
of Deenan and Mysree, which were once used
by the people of the forest.
It has been closed off for a long time,
so no one knows what it looks like inside.

column3:
ディナン深層林、南西にあるエルフ族の住居跡
聖なる泉、エルネア・スプリングに近い穏やかな
地のはずが、今や他と同じく野獣の住処に
なっている
column4:
The remains of the Elves who once resided
in Deenan Woods, located in the southwest.
What used to be a peaceful land near the sacred
Elnea Spring has now become a dwelling
for wild animals, just like everywhere else.

column3:
巨木に覆われ、緑の葉影が美しい遺跡
遺跡内に生えた巨木の中には、入る者
を拒みエント化したものもあるという
column4:
Covered by towering trees, the ruins are adorned
with the beautiful shade of green leaves.
It is said that some of the gigantic trees
that grow within the ruins have become Ents,
refusing entry to anyone who approaches them.

column3:
南部、水辺近くにあるエルフ族の住居跡
かつては水面に映る月が美しい場所であると
エルフ達の人気も高かったようだが、
今やその面影はない。水の運用に関しては
最も進んだ設備を備えていたらしい
column4:
Dilapidated uins of the Elves' residence
near the water's edge in the southern region.
It used to be a beautiful place where
the moon reflected upon the water
was once highly esteemed by the Elves.
However, now there is no trace of that beauty.
It seems they had the most advanced facilities
for managing water.

column3:
エルフ族が築いた壮麗なる都
しかし、エルフ族が姿を消して以降美しさはその
ままに、ゆっくり時と共に森に呑まれつつある
彼らの神秘的で精緻な技は、今なおエルテ・ディナン
のいたるところに遺されている
column4:
A magnificent city built by the Elves.
Even after their disappearance,
their structures' beauty remains,
gradually being retaken by the forest
with the passage of time.
Their mystical and exquisite craftsmanship
is still left everywhere in Erte Deenan.

column3:
どこかにあるという、エルフ達が築いた
美しい地下水路
遺跡で見つかった書物に存在が記されていた
column4:
According to a book found in the ruins,
there is a beautiful underground waterway
built by the Elves somewhere in the area.

column3:
エルフの都《エルテ・ディナン》内にある
区画の一つ。蝶印のついた鍵で閉ざされて
いるため、立ち入るのであればまずは
鍵の入手が必要になる
column4:
Located within the Elven capital, "Erte Deenan,"
this is a section of the city.
In order to enter, one must first obtain a key
marked with a butterfly symbol.

深いディナンの森で新たに発見された森民の遺跡
鳥の鳴き声や羽ばたきが四方から響いている
内部はかなり複雑な構造になっているらしく、元は
エルテ・ディナンに次ぐ規模の居住区だったようだ
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
A recently discovered forest dwelling of the
forest people in the depths of Deenan.
The sounds of birds chirping and wings flapping
echo from all directions.
The interior seems to have a quite complex
structure, and it appears that it was once a
residential area of considerable size, second only
to Erte Dinan.

ハイデル平原の北に隣接する原野
元はセラー湖の水に恵まれた肥沃な地だったが
民がハイデル平原に集い、北から来るオーク軍への
対抗手段としてグリッテン砦が建造されて後は
ほとんど人の立ち入らぬ危険地帯となった
column4:
Wilderness located to the north of Hidell Plains.
Originally, it was a fertile land, blessed
with the waters of Lake Cera. However,
as people gathered on the Hidell Plains
to defend against the invading Orc army
from the north, Fort Gritten was constructed.
Since then, it has become a dangerous area
that is rarely visited by regular folk.

column3:
オーク軍に対抗するため建造された大砦
統率レオ、副隊長ヴァネッサが率いるこの砦は
覚者隊によって守られ、北部からのオーク進軍
阻止の要となっている。また《ファイター》として
研鑽を目指す者にとっても重要な拠点である
column4:
A formidable fortress,
constructed to counter the Orc army.
Led by Commander Leo
and Vice Commander Vanessa,
it is defended by the Arisen Corps
and serves as a crucial stronghold
to halt the Orc's advance from the north.
It is also an important base for those
aspiring to become Fighters.

column3:
崖崩れで閉ざされていた道の復旧により
バートランド平原北部へ向かえるようになった
北部に向かう際は、一層オークに対し備える
必要がある
column4:
With the restoration of the road
that had been closed due to a cliffside collapse,
it is now possible to head towards
the northern part of the Betland Plains.
When heading to the north,
it is necessary to be prepared for Orcs.

column3:
セラー湖のほとり、旧騎士団監視塔の傍にある
廃墟。この付近に最近、獰猛なコロッサスが出没
するようになった。監視塔の水路はバートランドの
低地と高地を繋ぐ連絡路でもあるため、この魔物の
存在は、厄介な障害となっている
column4:
A ruin on the shores of Lake Cera,
near the old Knights' Watchtower.
Recently, a fierce Colossus wanders this area.
The waterway of the watchtower also serves
as a connecting passage between
Betland's lowlands and highlands,
so the presence of this enemy has become
a troublesome obstacle.

column3:
バートランド平原丘陵にある、北部の民の
地下墓地。オーク侵攻の際、劣勢になった騎士や
覚者が籠城し、追っ手のオーク共々内部から
出入り口を封じたという
column4:
In the subterranean burial grounds
of the Betland Plains Hills, located in the north,
the Knights and Arisen who were outnumbered
during the Orc invasion took refuge
and sealed the entrance from inside.

column3:
バートランド北部に繋がる谷間の橋に、オークの
一隊が侵入し南下を企てている
グリッテン砦やハイデル方面への侵入を防ぐため
発見し次第早急に討伐し、食い止める必要がある
column4:
A party of Orcs has invaded the bridge
in the valley leading to northern Betland,
attempting to push southward
towards Gritten Fort and the Hidell region.
It is necessary to promptly discover
and subdue them to thwart their advance.

column3:
セラー湖の浜辺一帯は、昔使われていた船が
漂着し、打ち上げられた船墓場がある。偵察隊
の報告によれば、その付近で多数の青トカゲが出現
し、さらには湖面に尖った背びれが見えたという
引き続き、調査が必要だろう
column4:
The entire beach area of Lake Cera
is a ship graveyard where old ships
have drifted in and washed ashore.
According to the reconnaissance team's report,
a large number of blue lizards have appeared in
the vicinity, and furthermore, pointed dorsal fins
were spotted breaking the surface of the lake.
Continued investigation will be necessary.

column3:
禊の神殿内部にある地下水道
水門を通る大量の水をテゴル川やセラー湖へと
浄化し流す役割を持っていた。だが何らかの理由
で神官長により封鎖されたようだ
column4:
Inside the Temple of Purification,
there is an underground waterway that used
to have the role of purifying and redirecting
a large amount of water through the water gate
to the Tegor River and Lake Cera.
However, for some reason, the waterway
has been sealed by the High Priest.

column3:
バートランドのどこかにあるという
オーク達の隠れアジト
大将モゴックの腹心、戦鬼ゲソムが指揮する
部隊の潜伏地であるらしい
column4:
A hidden Orc hideout in Betland.
It seems to be the hideout
of General Mogok's trusted warrior,
Gesomu the War Demon and his troops.

column3:
《バートランド大橋》の近く、オークとの
小競り合いが頻発する地点
川辺からの風に巻き上げられた砂埃に加え、野営に
使われたと思しき焚火が燻っているため、常に
薄煙がかかったようになっている
column4:
Near Betland Bridge, there is a point
where there is frequent skirmishing with Orcs.
In addition to the dust raised by the wind
from the riverside, there is often a thin smoke
in the air, possibly from a campfire.

column3:
バートランドの高地と低地を結ぶ地下通路
グリッテン砦の隊士達も以前は連絡路として
利用していたが、魔物が増えたことで現在は
あまりその機能を果たしていない
通路の一端は監視塔に続いている
column4:
Underground passage connecting
the highlands and lowlands of Betland.
The soldiers of Fort Gritten also used to use it
as a communication route in the past,
but now, due to the increase in enemies,
it is not fulfilling its function much anymore.
One end of the passage leads to a watchtower.

column3:
グリッテン砦東にある廃墟の地下室
バートランドは全域にオークが入りこんで
いるため、こういった場所は特に警戒する
必要がある
column4:
The basement of the ruins east of Gritten Fort.
Betland is infested with orcs throughout
the area, so in these places one needs
to be especially vigilant.

column3:
旧時代、白竜の座であったと伝えられる神殿
セラー湖の水を制御する水門を備えたこの神殿は
ドリード城と同時代、竜と人を繋ぐ場であったと
されている。すでにここを守る神官はおらず
老朽化も進んでいるが、その威容は健在
column4:
A temple said to have been the seat
of the White Dragon in ancient times.
This temple, equipped with floodgates
to control the waters of Lake Cera,
was believed to be a place that connected
dragons and humans, just like Dreed Castle.
Although there are no longer priests protecting
this place and it continues to deteriorate,
its majestic presence remains.

column3:
バートランド平原中ほどにある廃墟の
地下室。前に中を検分した隊士はあまりの
乾燥で喉がすぐやられてしまったそうだ
当時は、食糧や遺体がオークにより多数
投げ込まれ、酷い状態だったという
column4:
In the middle of the Betland Plains,
there is a cellar in ruins.
A soldier who inspected it before
reported his throat quickly dessicated
due to the extremely arid air.
At that time, food and bodies
were thrown into the cellar by Orcs,
and it was in a terrible state.

column3:
セラー湖の岸辺にある地下室
もとは禊の神殿からの一時物資保管庫だった
が、神殿が捨てられてからというもの
物資ともども小鬼達に占領されてしまった
column4:
The underground chamber by the shores
of Lake Cera originally served as a temporary
storage facility for supplies
for the Temple of Purification.
However, since the temple was abandoned,
it has been occupied by small monsters,
stealing the supplies therein.

column3:
バートランド平原の外れ、橋の傍にある
枯れ井戸。恐ろしげな呻き声が付近で響いて
いるらしく、オークの動向を探る覚者隊の
隊士たちはその付近を特に警戒するそうだ
column4:
On the outskirts of Betland Plains,
next to a bridge, there is a dry well.
A terrifying groaning sound echoes
throughout the vicinity, and the members
of the Arisen Corps, who are investigating
the movements of the Orcs,
are particularly cautious in that area.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
バートランド平原の西側、山腹の高台にある牢を
兼ねた地下墓地。旧時代、大罪を犯した者が送られ
死してなお外界に出さぬよう秘密裏に葬られたという
近年調査が入るまで長く閉鎖されたままになっていた
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
Located on the western side of the Betland
Plains, on a hillside, is an underground tomb
that also serves as a prison. In ancient times,
those who committed great sins were sent here
and secretly buried to prevent them
from returning to the outside world.
It remained closed for a long time
until recent investigations were carried out.

column3: 支援品ランクアップ

オーク軍が拠点とする北西の荒地
バートランド平原以北は魔物の支配する厳しい地
であるが、ドラワンの民は故郷を守り今日まで暮ら
してきた。また、北にかかる巨大な橋は《禁じられ
た地》に続くとされ、この地の者さえ近づかない
column4:
The barren land in the northwest
that serves as the base for the Orc army.
The area north of Betland Plains is a harsh land
ruled by enemies, but the people of Drawan
have managed to protect their homeland
and live on to this day. Furthermore,
it is said that the enormous bridge to the north
leads to the "Forbidden Land,"
a place even the locals dare not approach.

column3:
オークの根城に近い辺境の村
人がハイデル平原以南での防衛を決めてからこれ
まで、外部との交流はほとんど途絶えていた
厳しい環境ながら、故郷に残ると決めた者達により
村は守られ、細々と営みは続けられている
column4:
A remote village, nearby the Orc stronghold.
Has had little contact with the outside world
since the people decided to defend themselves
in the southern Hidell Plains.
Despite the harsh conditions, the villagers
who chose to stay in their homeland
have managed to protect the village
and continue their modest livelihood.

column3:
長きに渡り閉ざされてきた大橋の門が開いた
この先は、禁じられた地・ザンドラへと続いている
禁域へ足を踏み入れるのであれば
相応の覚悟と実力が必要となる
column4:
After a long time of being closed,
the gates of the bridge have opened.
Beyond this point awaits
the Forbidden Land of Zandora.
If you wish to step foot
into this forsaken territory,
steel thyself with resolve and strength.

column3:
オーク本陣ガルドノック砦の正面、橋のたもとに
遠征準備中のオーク小隊が待機している
準備中の小隊を確認した場合は、他の任務より
オーク出撃阻止を優先すべきだろう
column4:
In front of Gardnox Fortress,
at the base of the bridge, an Orc squad waits
in preparation for an expedition.
If you confirm the squad's preparations,
it should take precedence over other missions
to prevent the Orc's deployment.

column3:
ドラワン教会の地下に作られた富裕層向け公共墓地
だが死体を貪る悪鬼が司祭を襲い、墓地に侵入
するという事件以降、地下への扉は固く施錠された
それ以来、教会を訪れる者はほとんどいない
column4:
A public cemetery for the wealthy
was built in the basement of Drawan Church.
However, after an incident where a greedy demon
attacked the priest and invaded the cemetery,
the door to the basement was firmly locked.
Since then, very few people have come
to visit the church.

column3:
北バートランド東部の丘上に、オークが魔犬を
育成、訓練している場所が確認された
ここで特別に育てられたグリムワーグは斥候や
強襲に使われるため、そうなる前に手を打つことが
望ましい
column4:
On the hills in the eastern part of North Betland,
a place where Orcs breed and train canines
called Grimwargs, has been confirmed.
It would be beneficial to take action before
these ferocious specially-bred Grimwargs
are used for scouting and assault.

column3:
テゴル川河岸にある治水路
旧時代に作られた水路の中で、ガルドノック砦に
近いことからいち早く魔物に占拠された
内部は汚水が溢れ、封鎖された当時から酷い状況
だったという。使えるものがあるかは不明
column4:
The flood control ditch on the banks
of the Tegor River. Among the old waterways
built during ancient times, it was one of the first
to be occupied by monsters due to its proximity
to Gardnox Fortress. The interior was filled
with dirty water and has been in
a terrible condition since it was sealed off.
It is unknown if there is anything usable inside.

column3:
ガルドノック砦の南、哨戒地に頑丈な鱗ととりわけ
するどい牙を持つ地竜が出現した。どうやら
オーク軍が、次なるグリッテン砦への一手として
用意した軍竜のようだ
放置すれば本格的な脅威となるだろう
column4:
A strong Earth Dragon with durable scales
and especially sharp fangs has appeared
in the southern part of Gardnox Fortress,
in the patrol area.
It seems that the Orc army has prepared
this dragon unit as their next move
towards taking Gritten Fort. If left unattended,
it will become a significant threat.

column3:
オークが根城とする大砦《ガルドノック砦》において
戦力の中核を担う地位にあるオークがいる詰所
近頃妙にオークの出入りが多く、周囲の住人からは
この《戦鬼の陣屋》にて何らかの作戦会議が
行われているのではないかと不安の声が上がっている
column4:
In the great Gardnox Fortress,
the main Orc stronghold, there is a camp
where orcs vie for a position to play
a central role in the war. Recently,
orcs have been coming and going strangely,
and the surrounding residents are concerned
that some kind of strategy meeting is being held
in this War Demons' Encampment.

column3:
騎士団がガルドノック砦を守っていたその昔
資材庫だった地下室
現在はここもまた、オークや魔物の支配下にある
column4:
Back in the day when the Knights
defended Gardnox Fortress,
the basement used to be a storehouse.
Now this place is also under the control
of orcs and demons.

column3:
バートランド平原北部、ガルドノック砦に
近い井戸。長らく放置されているため
雨風にさらされ朽ちかけている
column4:
A well near Gardnox Fortress
in the Northern Betland Plains.
It has been left untouched for a long time,
exposed to wind and rain
and on the verge of decay.

column3:
バートランド北部からセラー湖の岸辺に繋がる
地下道。ガルドノック砦がオークに占領される前
騎士団が通り道や保管庫として作ったものである
らしい。もちろん、現在利用している人間はいない
column4:
An underground passage from the northern
part of Betland to the shores of Lake Cera.
It seems that the knight order built it
as a thoroughfare and storage facility
before Gardnox Fortress was occupied by orcs.
Of course, there are no humans currently using it.

column3:
オーク軍が根城とする旧時代の大砦
かつては立派な外堀を持つ騎士団の砦だったが
白竜が墜ちて後オークに占領され、恐ろしい魔物の
城と化した。首領モゴックが手勢を率い、この砦を
起点にハイデルへの侵略を企てている
column4:
Formerly a fortress of the Knights Order
that had an impressive moat.
It has now been occupied by Orcs
after the fall of the White Dragon,
transforming into a terrifying stronghold
of monstrous creatures. The leader Mogok
leads his forces from this fortress,
plotting an invasion of Hidell.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
《ガルドノック砦》の奥から続き、テゴル川の水を
堀へと引き込むための水廊。未だオークが根城とする
この場所に、侵食の影響を受けた個体が存在している
らしい。脅威が拡散する前に、芽を摘む必要がある
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
Continuing from the depths of Gardnox Fortress,
this water corridor is used to draw the water
from the Tegor River into the moat.
It seems that there are infected individuals
affected by corruption still inhabiting this place,
which the Orcs still use as their stronghold.
It is necessary to nip this threat in the bud
before it spreads.

column3: 支援品ランクアップ

レスタニア最北の《禁じられた地》
かつて黄金都市と謳われたメルゴダは大地ごと
消失しており、深く抉れた大穴だけがその痕跡を
示している。錬金技術で造られた歪な半生物は
大地に残され、今なお徘徊し続けているという
column4:
North of Lestania lies the Forbidden Land,
Mergoda, once hailed as the Golden City.
However, it has completely disappeared,
leaving only a deep, infinite hole in its place.
Twisted, semi-living creatures created
through alchemy remain on the land,
still wandering to this day.

column3:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
古いポーン、ダイオンが百年以上に渡り
護り続けている祠。ザンドラ禁域を訪れる
覚者への任務と警鐘を伝えるための場でもある
column4:
One of the altars of the White Dragon,
which was worshipped in various regions
in ancient times. The old Pawn, Dian,
has been protecting this shrine
for over a hundred years.
It is also a place to convey missions
and warnings to the Arisen
who visit the Zandora Wastelands.

column3:
古い時代の謎に魅せられ、世俗を捨てた隠者が
一人で住む家。隠者はたびたび依頼の品や
問題について、祠に依頼を寄せているようだ
column4:
A hermit who was captivated by the mysteries
of ancient times, and who abandoned
the secular world, lives alone in a house.
The hermit often sends requests to the shrine
for items or issues that need attention.

column3:
二つのアーチ状の岩壁に囲まれた谷。そこを
メルゴダを守り続ける錬魔兵団が巡回している
今や、その巡視命令を解ける者はいないため
亡都へ向かうには彼らとの交戦もやむないだろう
まれに、恐るべき女守官が帯同することも
column4:
A valley enclosed by two arched rock walls.
The Mergoda Patrol Corps, dedicated to guarding
Mergoda, conducts regular patrols there.
At present, there is no one capable of revoking
their patrol orders, so combat may be inevitable
in order to proceed towards the capital.
Occasionally, a formidable female commander
accompanies them.

column3:
ザンドラの蛮族が縄張りとする彼らの関所、通称
バンデッドホーントで、鉄の巨人が目撃された
彼らが発掘したものなのか、亡都からやって来た
ものかは不明。秘術の流出やバートランドの
新たな脅威となる前に破壊する必要がある
column4:
This checkpoint, known as the Banded Haunt,
is the territory of Zandora's barbarians.
A giant made of iron was seen there.
It is unclear whether they discovered it
or if it came from the fallen capital.
It is necessary to destroy it before it becomes
a new threat of leaked secret artes for Betland.

column3:
禁域南東部の遺跡群には、文化を失い蛮行を
働き生き続けてきた集団が居付いている。彼ら
《ザンドラ・バルバロイ》に交渉や説得は不可能
なため、遭遇時は流血沙汰を覚悟しなければ
ならないだろう
column4:
In the ruins in the southeastern forbidden area,
there is a group called the Zandora Barbarians
who have lost their culture and continue
to engage in savage acts.
Negotiation and persuasion with them
are impossible, so one must be prepared
for bloodshed if encountered.

column3:
セラー湖北岸の浜辺付近で、オークの残党が
野営を行っているのが確認された
どうやら、ガルドノックを離れた大将級の一派
らしい。新勢力となる前に有力な残党は叩いて
おきたい所だ
column4:
Near the beach on the northern shore
of Lake Cera, it has been confirmed
that remnants of orcs are camping there.
It is a faction of high-ranking commanders
who have left Gardnox. We should strike down
these influential remnants before they become
a new force to be reckoned with.

column3:
湿った黒土の谷間に、一頭のナイトメアが飛来した
かつてメルゴダの民が《嘆きのモーラ》と呼び
白竜自らが撃退せしめた恐るべき魔鳥である
放置すれば、レスタニア全土の危機となる
可能性がある
column4:
In the moist crevice of black soil,
a Nightmare flew in. It was once known
as the "Wailing Mora" by the people of Mergoda,
a fearsome bird that the White Dragon himself
repelled at one time. If left unchecked,
it could pose a threat to all of Lestania.

column3:
ザンドラ禁域の一画、錬金の秘術に
魅せられた者たちが潜み独自の研究を
繰り広げていた場所
現在もその名残の書物などが散乱するが
肝心の研究者たちがどこに消えたかは不明
column4:
In a corner of the Zandora Wastelands,
where people entranced and fascinated
by the secrets of alchemy hid,
they carried out their own research.
Even now, remnants of their studies
such as books can be found scattered about,
but the whereabouts of the researchers
themselves remain unknown.

column3:
禁域のどこかにあるらしい地下泉
祝福を受けた泉は高位の術師が管理していた
そうだが現在はその場所すら定かでない
column4:
There seems to be an underground spring
somewhere in the restricted area.
The blessed spring was managed
by a high-ranking sorcerer, but now,
even the exact location is uncertain.

column3:
ザンドラ禁域北端、地上に残った外周部
メルゴダ入り口にあたる区画であり、政治と深く
関わる錬金術研究の中心地であった。そのため
最も警戒すべき場所として、神殿により禁域と
して秘匿されてきた
column4:
Located at the northern border
of Zandora Wastelands, this is the section
that holds the entrance to Mergoda.
It was the hub of alchemized research
closely intertwined with politics.
As a result, it has been concealed
as a forbidden area by the Temple,
making it the most guarded of places.

column3:
ザンドラ禁域を東西に結ぶ大地下水路
セラー湖の水をメルゴダへ送るため整備された
水路であったが、現在は恐ろしい魔物の潜む
大迷路と化している
column4:
The Underground Waterway that connects
the Zandora Wastelands from east to west.
Was originally constructed to transport water
from Lake Cera to Mergoda.
However, it has now transformed into
a terrifying labyrinth, completely infested
with dangerous enemies.

column3:
旧時代、錬金研究の実験所だった地下施設
現在内部がどうなっているかは不明だが
秘術の実験体など忌まわしい研究の産物が
潜んでいる可能性は大きい
column4:
In the past, it was an underground facility
for alchemic research. The current state
of its interior is unknown. However,
there is a high possibility that abominable
creations of forbidden experiments,
such as experimental subjects of secret artes,
may be lurking within.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
《南ザンドラ遺跡群》の一角にある旧時代の井戸
これまではその存在すら忘れられていたが
恐ろしい咆哮が奥から遺跡群一帯に響くようになった
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
An ancient well in a corner
of the South Zandora Ruins.
Its existence had been forgotten until now,
but a terrifying roar can now be heard
from its depths throughout the entire ruins.

メルゴダ繁栄期、都の一部だった地域
都喪失の後は凶悪な魔物が跋扈し、墓地群は
不死者の彷徨う呪われた地と化した。しかし
数多く残された家屋遺跡は訪れた者に再利用
され、探検拠点として賑わいを見せている
column4:
During the flourishing period of Mergoda,
it was a part of the capital city.
After the loss of the capital, brutal enemies
ran rampant, and the group of graveyards
became a cursed land where the undead wander.
However, many remaining house ruins
have been repurposed by visitors
and have become lively exploration bases.

column3:
禁じられた地にもっとも近い、探索者の拠点
すでに元の住民はおらず、旧時代の宝や発見を
求める者達が遺跡を再利用し、宿や商店を開いて
いる。この町のよろず屋には剣豪《ウォリアー》
として名高いオリバーが滞在している
column4:
Nearest to the forbidden land,
the base of the explorers.
The original residents are no longer here,
and those who seek ancient treasures
and discoveries have repurposed the ruins,
opening inns and shops.
Oliver, renowned as a warrior,
resides in this town's general shop.

column3:
禁域と東部の狭間の谷に、奇妙なバランスで
そびえる岩がある。その岩の周囲には、不思議と
不気味な物が集まりやすいようだ。不浄の魔物が
発生していた場合でも、急いで抜ければ追い
つかれることはないはずだ
column4:
In the valley between the Forbidden Zone
and the eastern region, there stands a peculiar,
towering rock formation.
It seems that strange and eerie things
are naturally drawn to its surroundings.
Even if foul enemies were to emerge,
one should be able to escape
without being pursued if they hurry.

column3:
東ザンドラ廃墟群のただ中に、忽然と灼熱の
魔像が姿を現したという
盗掘者が掘りあてたのか、遺物が侵入者に
反応したか起動の原因は不明だが、ゾマに
とって新たな心配の種であることは間違いない
column4:
In the heart of the East Zandora Ruins,
a scorching hot magical statue suddenly
materialized. Whether it was unearthed
by looters or if it was triggered by the intrusion
of relics, the exact cause of its activation
remains unclear. Nevertheless,
it is undoubtedly a new source of worry for Zoma.

column3:
ザンドラ・バルバロイの一派が魔獣を手なずけ
北の灯台を根城に居座り始めたとの情報が入った
大きなトサカと翼の影が目撃されていることから
彼らの飼う魔物はコカトリスであると見られる
column4:
We have received information that Zandora's
Barbarian faction has tamed a magical beast
and have taken up residence
in the northern lighthouse.
Large crests and shadows of wings have
been sighted, suggesting that the creature
they possess is a Cockatrice.

column3:
死者の丘、祠墓地前に広がる陰鬱な庭
そこに何者かが突如として現れ、盗掘者を
皆殺しにしたという
墓荒らしと間違われぬためにも、周囲は避けて
通る方が賢明だろう
column4:
Hill of the Dead, a gloomy garden
in front of the cemetery.
Suddenly, someone appeared there
and slaughtered all the grave robbers.
To avoid being mistaken for a grave desecrator,
it would be wise to avoid passing through.

column3:
ザンドラ東部、《死者の丘》と呼ばれる地にある
地下礼拝堂。冥界の王を奉るための場所であり
深部には亡霊騎士が守る呪われた秘宝があると
墓荒らしの間でまことしやかに囁かれている
挑んだ者全てが帰らなかったため、封鎖された
column4:
Eastern Zandora, an underground chapel
referred to as the Hill of the Dead. It is a place
dedicated to the king of the underworld,
and deep within, it is rumored that a cursed
treasure guarded by a ghost knight can be found.
Due to the fact that everyone who has challenged
it has never returned, it has been sealed off.

column3:
ザンドラ東部、人獣を問わず屍が放置された
ままとなり死臭が染みついた小路
屍は盗賊の襲撃を受けた犠牲者とも、魔物に
喰らわれた獲物とも推測されているが
この地においてそれを追及する者はいない
column4:
A narrow path in Eastern Zandora
where corpses of both humans and animals
are left unattended, permeating the air
with the stench of death.
It is speculated that these corpses
are the victims of bandit raids
or prey devoured by large creatures.
However, there is no one here
who investigates such matters.

column3:
セラー湖にそびえる禊の神殿・上層部
禊の神殿内部には、失われた都に続く湖底大通路
が存在すると言われるが、長らくその扉は白竜神殿
により管理、封印されてきた
column4:
The upper echelons of the Temple of Purification
located on Lake Cera, towering over the lake.
It is said that within the temple lies a grand
underwater passageway leading to the lost city.
However, for a long time, the doors to this
passageway have been guarded and sealed
by the White Dragon Temple.

column3:
ゾマのすぐ裏手にある枯れ井戸
死者の丘から迷い込み、井戸に入り込んだまま
出られなくなった亡者がいるらしく、不気味な
声が周囲に漏れることがある
column4:
Behind Zoma, there is a dried-up well.
It is said that there are spirits who got lost
from the Hill of the Dead and ended up trapped
in the well, unable to escape.
Sometimes, unsettling voices are heard,
leaking out into the surroundings.

column3:
東ザンドラ廃墟群と呼ばれる亡都の周辺都市は
いまだわずかに当時の生活様式が見て取れ、錬金
遺物も発掘される。廃墟の中には屋内や
地下へ入れる遺構も多いが、魔物や掠奪者
も居付いているため危険が伴う
column4:
The area surrounding the ruins known as
the East Zandora Ruins still retains some
remnants of the lifestyle of that time,
and alchemized artifacts are also excavated.
Within the ruins, there are many structures
that lead indoors or underground,
but they are also inhabited by enemies
and looters, so there is danger involved.

column3:
ザンドラ灯台の地下倉庫
もしかするとまだ使える物資も残っている
かもしれないが、じめじめとした僻地の
地下はそれよりも不浄なもののほうが多く
溜まっているだろう
column4:
Zandora Lighthouse's Underground Stores.
There might still be usable supplies left,
but in the damp and remote underground,
there are more foul things accumulated
than clean ones.

column3:
不気味な庭を持つ祠。夜な夜な生者か死者か
判別できぬ怨嗟の声が聞こえると言われ
一帯でも特に不吉な場所とされている
近寄れば、冥府の執行者により魂を奪われる
という噂がある
column4:
A shrine with an unsettling garden.
It is said that bizarre voices of unknown origin
can be heard at night, whether they come
from the living or the dead.
This place is considered particularly ominous
in the entire area. If you approach it,
it is rumored that the executor
of the underworld will take away your soul.

column3:
《死者の丘》では比較的規模の小さな祠
本来は地下墓地だったが、入り込んだ魔獣達に
遺体のほとんどは食われてしまっている
死者はほぼ空の地下墓地だが、内部には別の
存在が潜んでいるかもしれない
column4:
In the Hill of the Dead,
there is a relatively small shrine that was
originally an underground burial ground.
However, most of the bodies have been
consumed by the invading animals.
The subterranean burial ground
is almost empty of the dead, but there
may be another entity lurking inside.

column3:
セラー湖の湖底地下洞窟に広がる大水路
禊の神殿本殿と離殿を繋ぐ、水の浄化施設を
兼ねた補助連絡通路だった
あまりに長く、迷う者が絶えなかったため
封鎖されていた
column4:
The large waterway that spreads through
the underground caverns at the bottom
of Lake Cera was a supplementary
communication passage that also served
as a purification facility for the main and
detached shrines of the Temple of Purification.
It had been sealed off because many people
got lost in its extensive length.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
ザンドラ東部、《死者の丘》ふもとの崖から
近年発掘された旧時代の地下墓地
発見した墓荒らしによると、侵入直後に恐ろしい
までの悪寒に襲われ、命からがら逃げ出したという
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
Located at the foot of the Hill of the Dead
in Eastern Zandora.
A recently discovered underground tomb
from ancient times.
According a grave robber, they were struck
by a horrible chill upon entering
and narrowly escaped with their lives.
